name: Reboot Spec Kit
description:
A kit for making beautiful Design Systems and UX Specs


Reboot was crafted to solve these problems:

  • You don’t know where to start when creating a design system or spec.
  • Decision fatigue when organizing and presenting your work.
  • Cleaning up Figma has become its own step in the design process.
  • Your design thinking isn’t documented with UI specs, so collaborators are missing context.


The Reboot Spec Kit is simple and lightweight.


Customize in seconds

Update a handful of styles to make Reboot fit your brand and feel unique.


Design faster

Focus on your product design, not your documentation. With a clean system for communication and organization, you free your mind for creativity.


Dark mode

All components are built with dark mode variants. Turn it on with a single toggle. Great for game designers.


Please let me know what you think in the comments.
